test.name: TEST1
test.sparql:
BASE <urn:base:> PREFIX : <urn:default:> PREFIX p: <urn:p:>
SELECT DISTINCT ?g (0 AS ?v2)
FROM : FROM p: FROM :r FROM p:r FROM NAMED <n>
WHERE { ?s1 ?p1 ?o1, ?o2 ; ?p2 ?o3 .
?s2 ?p3 << ?es ?ep ?eo >> .
FILTER EXISTS { ?e1 ?e2 ?e3 } } GROUP BY ?g HAVING (0) ORDER BY ?o LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2 VALUES (?1 ?2) { (0 1) (2 UNDEF) }

test.name: Updates
Terms
test.sparql:
BASE <b:> PREFIX p: <p:> PREFIX : <dp:>
ASK WHERE { ?s $p 0, true, false, '', ''@en, ''^^:, <>, <x>, :n, p:, p:n, [], [ a 0 ], (), ( 0 ), _:n, << : : : >> }
